description: Watch your code garden grow with each session. Plants evolve from seeds to trees based on your activity, with dynamic weather effects.

statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); SESSION=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".session_id" | cut -c1-8); CACHE="/tmp/garden_$SESSION"; if [ ! -f "$CACHE" ]; then echo "0" > "$CACHE"; fi; GROWTH=$(cat "$CACHE"); GROWTH=$((GROWTH + 1)); echo "$GROWTH" > "$CACHE"; STAGE=$((GROWTH / 10)); case $STAGE in 0) PLANT="🌱";; 1) PLANT="🌿";; 2) PLANT="🍃";; 3) PLANT="🌳";; *) PLANT="🌺";; esac; WEATHER=$([ $((GROWTH % 7)) -eq 0 ] && echo "🌧️" || [ $((GROWTH % 5)) -eq 0 ] && echo "☀️" || echo "⛅"); echo "[$MODEL] $PLANT $WEATHER Garden Lv.$STAGE | 📁 ${DIR##*/} | Growth: $GROWTH"'
